mdRecord.dcterms:title: Collapsed Building
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Two copies of a collapsed building photograph, with one photograph having writing on the front and back. On the front the photograph has two objects being pointed to by arrows, which from left to right read "Allen Block Bldg." and "Old Salem Theatre", as well as 1937 being written on both the front and back of the photograph.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
